text: The men's 400 metres hurdles event at the 2003 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Bydgoszcz, Poland, at Zawisza Stadion on 17, 18, and 19 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Marek Plawgo ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Christian Duma ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Thomas Kortbeek ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 19 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Name !! Nationality !! Time !!
